  • Constructor Details

    • GameScreen

      public GameScreen​(DrawingSurface surface, int selection) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      recommended use of GameScreen constructor since it correctly initializes the Game with the Mech of the player's preference.

      Parameters:
      surface - PApplet surface being used to draw the game.
      selection - integer value indicating which Mech the player selected.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      public void draw()
      use surface to access graphics.
      • complete all actions first.
      • next draw background objects.
      • finally draw actors, sprites and other such objects.
